description.translate: Exhausted by the torment, and yet in front of a terrible fate, deprived of rest.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Prélude à la fausse aurore\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Exténuée par le supplice, et pourtant au devant\"}","{\"text\":\"§7d'un destin effroyable, amputé de repos.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Exhausted by the torment, and yet in front\"}","{\"text\":\"§7of a terrible fate, deprived of rest.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a2 §7SPD§a2 §7HAS§a1 §7LUC§c-1\"}"]}}
